content.text: Match ends, Dinamo Zagreb 0, Juventus 4.
Second Half ends, Dinamo Zagreb 0, Juventus 4.
Attempt missed. Filip Benkovic (Dinamo Zagreb) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Foul by Paulo Dybala (Juventus).
Domagoj Pavicic (Dinamo Zagreb) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mario Situm (Dinamo Zagreb).
Attempt missed. Armin Hodzic (Dinamo Zagreb) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Offside, Dinamo Zagreb. Paulo Machado tries a through ball, but Filip Benkovic is caught offside.
Foul by Marko Pjaca (Juventus).
Ivan Fiolic (Dinamo Zagreb) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Dinamo Zagreb 0, Juventus 4. Dani Alves (Juventus) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.

Foul by Mario Mandzukic (Juventus).
Attempt saved. Paulo Dybala (Juventus) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Attempt saved. Marko Pjaca (Juventus) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Patrice Evra.
Substitution, Dinamo Zagreb. Paulo Machado replaces Domagoj Antolic.
Substitution, Juventus. Mario Mandzukic replaces Gonzalo Higuaín.
Offside, Juventus. Dani Alves tries a through ball, but Gonzalo Higuaín is caught offside.
Substitution, Juventus. Marko Pjaca replaces Andrea Barzagli.
Substitution, Dinamo Zagreb. Armin Hodzic replaces Junior Fernandes.
Goal!  Dinamo Zagreb 0, Juventus 3. Paulo Dybala (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dani Alves.

Substitution, Juventus. Juan Cuadrado replaces Miralem Pjanic because of an injury.
